name: Spotify Dark/Light
description: Clean and elegant design with dark controls and a light content background. Customizable highlight color and option to have Player controls in the sidebar. Features: - Your choice of highlight color1 - Option to integrate the player controls into the side bar 2 - Custom artwork effects, sane font sizes, sensible & responsive layout. 1 choose one that works on both bright and dark backgrounds 2 Manually advance a track once to get high resolution artwork to load thereafter. Suggested Colors: Red: #d92727; Blue: #099fcf; Green: #0bb347; Purple: #8208d3; Gold: #dc9000 Suggestions/Feedback welcome.
additional_info:
v1.8.1
- Fixed search page (again) and other new bugs.

v1.8
- New Search page layout
- Chasing new bugs as Spotify rolls out updates

v1.7.5 
- Top tracks on Artist Page have a new look.
- Playlists are now accessible via popup when the Navbar is collapsed (horizontal Player layout).

v1.7
- Updated Player bar in default (horizontal) mode to have less height
- Updated look of folders in the nav bar
- Many bugfixes and touch-ups that accumulated over time
